summary: An FBI document dated July 3, 2020, summarizing a tip from a witness who claims to have seen Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton, New York. The witness states Maxwell was attempting to avoid attention and provides information suggesting Maxwell may be hiding in Narragansett. The witness also claims Maxwell helped procure underage girls for Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.role: Subject of sighting, alleged associate of Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The witness claims to have seen Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton, NY, and states she is deeply connected to Jeffrey Epstein and helped procure underage girls.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Deceased financier and accused sex trafficker
persons.context: Mentioned as the person Ghislaine Maxwell is deeply connected to, for whom she allegedly helped procure underage girls.

connections.description: The document states Maxwell is 'deeply connected to Jeffrey Epstein and helped procure underage' girls for him.

events.title: Reported sighting of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: A witness claims to have seen Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton, New York, on the Wednesday prior to July 3, 2020. The witness stated Maxwell appeared panicked and was wearing 'homely clothes' to avoid attention.

keyFacts: A witness reported a sighting of Ghislaine Maxwell in East Hampton, New York, around July 1, 2020.
The witness claimed Maxwell was visibly panicked and wearing 'homely clothes' to avoid drawing attention to herself.
The witness provided information suggesting Maxwell may be hiding in Narragansett.
The witness alleged that Maxwell is 'deeply connected to Jeffrey Epstein and helped procure underage' girls.
The witness indicated she was open to contact and had personal experience with abuse.
